Reviews.Title: Pretty good product
Reviews.Author: TanyaP.
Reviews.Content: It was purchased for a 3 year old so high pixel photos are not expected. It seems to be pretty durable and my child has so much fun.  Other than the batteries dying veryyyyyyyy quickly this is a good product, I would suggest either rechargable batteries or investing in a ton of AAAs.

Reviews.Title: It broke on the second day
Reviews.Author: Steph C
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my nephew but it broke the second day he was playing with it. It won't even turn on anymore. The resolution on the screen is really low.

ProductInfo.Features:
Includes editing software
Takes up to 120 photos or a few minutes of video
Easy to see preview screen
ProductInfo.Name: Nickelodeon SpongeBob Digital Camera with 1.4-Inch LCD Screen - Yellow (27062)
